title: Machine Learning Solutions
content: Experianced with advanced algorithms for predictive analytics (regression), classification, and clustering using PyTorch, Scikit-learn and TensorFlow.

title: Generative AI Applications
content: Experianced with LangChain and LangGraph frameworks, OpenAI embeddings, ChromaDB and Pinecone vectore databases, and Streamlit & NextJS for deployment.

title: AI & ML Deployment
content: Expertise in deploying scalable AI and ML models using CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps, and Azure Machine Learning for seamless model integration.

title: Data Engineering
content: Orchestrate ETL pipelines with custom azure functions, ingesting data into optimal storage solutions, and complex data transformation using Databricks.

title: Reporting & data visualization
content: Skilled in Power BI for connecting to various data sources (M), performing efficient data modeling, complex calculations (DAX), and creating insightful dashboards.

title: Data Strategy & Consulting
content: Specialized in solving any data-related challenges, from devising data strategies for immature companies to optimizing existing processes.
